description:
Thanks to the Yahoo Finance and S&P 500 Index, Downloaded directly from Yahoo Finance Public Data.
Data include: data with date, The highest tradeing value as high, lowest trading value as low, opening value as open and closing value as close, total volume and adjusted closing value as Adj Close. 
The tasks which could be achieve using the data are:
Mean return.
Covariance.
Standard Deviation.
Creation of Simulation for future predictions.
title: Akamai(AKAM) Stock Data
